name: Nourhan Sharawy

education.degree: Bachelor's degree in Media and Mass Communication

experience.title: Call Center Agent
responsibilities: Streamlined call center operations, optimizing staff scheduling and reducing average call wait times. Improved caller satisfaction by implementing effective coaching and training techniques for call center staff.
responsibilities2: Enhanced financial decision-making capabilities through timely, accurate information management. Trained new employees on accounting principles and company procedures. Reviewed accounts, resolved coding areas, and tracked recurring expenses for accrual entry.
responsibilities3: Handled customer inquiries and complaints regarding products and services. Collaborated with team members to resolve complex issues and provide exceptional service.
